## 内容提纲
+ tibble数据框

+ 变量管理:使用`dplyr`

    - `filter()`: 筛选案例  | `sample_n()` / `sample_frac()`: 随机选择案例
    - `select()`: 筛选变量  | `rename()`: 变量重命名
    - `fct_recode`:recode变量 |  `mutate()`: 增加新变量
    - `summarise()` 汇总统计  |  `group_by()` 分组

## tibbles 数据框

data.frame基础做了针对性的改进。无行名，不修改变量类型，灵活列印,索引方便等等。继承了data.frame的其他多数特性。

```{r,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
as_tibble(iris)
```

## tibble数据

手工创建数据集
```{r}
df <- tibble(
  x = 1:5, 
  y = 1, 
  z = x ^ 2 + y
)
df %>% .$x  #  或者.[["x"]]
df
```

## tibble数据集
tribble方便小块数据输入
```{r}
tribble(
  ~x, ~y, ~z,

  "a", 2, 3.6,
  "b", 1, 8.5
)
```

## R读入CSV等文本数据
使用tidyverse中的readr包：
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r,eval = FALSE}
library(readr)
dataset <- read_csv(文件路径和文件名)
```
- read_csv()  读入csv文件,
- read_csv2() 读入封号分割文件
- read_tsv()  读入制表符分割文件 
- read_delim() 读入各种固定分隔符文件.
- read_fwf()  读入固定宽度文件；用 fwf_widths() or fwf_positions()设定栏位 
- read_table() 读入空格分割的固定宽度文件
- read_log() 读入Apache风格的log文件。更复可参考`webreadr` 。

# 使用`dplyr` 处理变量

## `dplyr` 规则

- 第一个参数是数据框
- 返回的是数据框 

## 筛选个案 `filter()`

- 选择案例（行）
- 能同时设定多个筛选条件

选出Durham县发生的与自行车相关的交通事故
注意：== | & > < >= <= != 等比较符号。
```{r,message= FALSE,warning=FALSE}
bike %>%
  filter(County == "Durham")
```

## 筛选个案`filter()` 

选出Durham县且骑行者年龄 < 10 的案例

```{r}
bike %>%
  filter(County == "Durham",Bike_Age < 10)
```

## `slice()` 选择部分案例 

头五条
```{r}
bike %>% 
  slice(1:5)
#等价于bike %>% head(5)
```

## `slice()` 选择部分案例

最后五条
```{r}
last_row <- nrow(bike)
bike %>%
  slice((last_row-4):last_row)
# 等价于bike %>% tail(5)
```

## `sample_n()` or `sample_frac()`随机挑选案例 

- `sample_n()`: 随机选5个案例
```{r}
bike_n5 <- bike %>%
  sample_n(5, replace = FALSE)
dim(bike_n5)
```

## tibble::glimpse
```{r}
bike %>%
  glimpse()
```


- `sample_n()`: 随机选5个案例
```{r}
bike_n5 <- bike %>%
  sample_n(5, replace = FALSE)
bike_n5[1:5]
```

## 选择变量`select()`

```{r}
bike %>%
  select(BikeAge_Gr, Bike_Sex) %>%
  table()
```

## 筛选变量-删除 `select()`

```{r}
bike %>%
  select(FID,OBJECTID) %>%
  select(-OBJECTID) %>%
  names()
```

##重命名 `rename()`  

修改变量名.多个包中都有这个函数。

将`Speed_Limi` 改为`Speed_Limit`:

```{r}
 bike %>%
  rename(Speed_Limit = Speed_Limi) %>%
  select(starts_with("Bike_")) %>%
  names()
```

## 创建变量`mutate()`  
可以自定义非常复杂的函数，而不仅仅是基本算数运算。
```{r}
bike <- bike %>%
  mutate(Bike_birth=Crash_Year - Bike_Age,
         Drvr_birth=Crash_Year - Drvr_Age,
         month = lubridate:: month(Crash_Date))

bike%>% ggplot(aes(month)) +  geom_bar() 

```

## recode因子变量
查看原取值
```{r}
bike %>%count(DrvrAge_Gr)
```
将70 和70+ 合并

## recode因子变量

```{r}
library(forcats)
bike <- bike %>%
  forcats::as_factor(DrvrAge_Gr) %>%  # 实际上可以不要
  mutate(DrvrAge_Gr = fct_recode(DrvrAge_Gr,"70+"="70")) %>%
  mutate(DrvrAge_Gr2 = fct_collapse(DrvrAge_Gr,
                                   "0-19"="0-19",
                                   "20-29"=c("20-24","25-29"),
                                   "30-39"="30-39",
                                   "40-49"="40-49",
                                   "50-59"="50-59",
                                   "60+"=c("60-69","70+")
                                   ))
```
得到因子变量。如果原变量是labelled数值，请先转为因子，再recode。

##  recode连续变量为分类变量
```{r,fig.height=2,fig.align = "center"}
sjPlot::set_theme(base= theme_bw(),theme.font ='STSong',
                  title.align='center')
bike %>%
   mutate(B_agegr=cut(Bike_Age,breaks=c(0,20,40,60,Inf),
          labels=c("youth","oldyouth","midage","elder")) %>% 
           structure(label ="年龄组") ) %>% 
sjPlot::sjplot(B_agegr,title = "骑行者年龄分组")
```
ggplot2::cut_number可以等案例数(近似)分割

findInterval也可以分组，左闭区间。cut默认是右闭

[控制Rmd输出文件中图片的大小](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/figure_sizing_knitr/)

## 替换变量：因子变量

```{r}
# 因子变量只能替换为已定义的取值,不如用recode
bike <- bike %>%
             mutate(DrvrAge_Gr3 =replace(DrvrAge_Gr ,
                                        is.na(DrvrAge_Gr ),
                                        "70+"))
bike %>%count(DrvrAge_Gr3) 
```

## 替换变量：连续变量

```{r}
bike <- bike %>%
             mutate(Drvr_Age2=replace(Drvr_Age ,
                                        is.na(Drvr_Age),
                                        mean(Drvr_Age,na.rm=TRUE)))
bike %>%summarise(mean=mean(Drvr_Age2,na.rm=TRUE))

```

## 替换变量：连续变量
```{r}
bike <- bike %>%
             mutate(DrvrAge_Gr4=if_else(Drvr_Age<30,1,
                                if_else(Drvr_Age>=60,3,2)))
#bike %>%count(DrvrAge_Gr4)
#等价于
bike <- bike %>%
     mutate(DrvrAge_Gr4=replace(Drvr_Age,Drvr_Age<30,1)) %>%
     mutate(DrvrAge_Gr4=replace(DrvrAge_Gr4,Drvr_Age>=30&Drvr_Age<60,2)) %>%
    mutate(DrvrAge_Gr4=replace(DrvrAge_Gr4,Drvr_Age>=60,3))

bike %>%count(DrvrAge_Gr4)
```
  
  
## 替换变量：文本变量

<div class="question">
`BikeAge_Gr` 中`10-Jun` or `15-Nov` 是错误的
</div>

```{r}
bike %>%
  group_by(BikeAge_Gr) %>%
  summarise(crash_count = n())
```


## 替换变量：文本变量

- 清理这个文本数据，年龄分组而不是日期
    + `10-Jun` 应该为 `6-10`
    + `15-Nov` 应该为 `11-15`

```{r}
bike <- bike %>%
  mutate(BikeAge_Gr = str_replace(BikeAge_Gr, "10-Jun", "6-10")) %>%
  mutate(BikeAge_Gr = str_replace(BikeAge_Gr, "15-Nov", "11-15"))
```


## 分类汇总
```{r}
out <- bike %>%
  group_by(Bike_Sex) %>% 
summarize(
    min = min(Bike_Age ,na.rm = TRUE),
    max = max(Bike_Age,na.rm = TRUE),
    mean = mean(Bike_Age ,na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = sd(Bike_Age,na.rm = TRUE),
    missing = sum(is.na(Bike_Age))
  )
knitr::kable(out)
```


## 分类汇总与排序

```{r}
bike %>%
  group_by(BikeAge_Gr) %>%
  summarise(crash_count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(crash_count))
```

## 分类汇总与排序
top_n 可以得到最多的几个
```{r}
bike %>%
  group_by(BikeAge_Gr) %>%
  summarize(crash_count= n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(crash_count)) %>%
  top_n(n = 5)   #如果要降序可以加一句 
```

# 字符串处理详解

## 字符串：粘合：paste
```{r}
paste("X", 1:5, sep = ".")
paste("X", 1:5, sep = ".", collapse = "")
paste0("X", 1:5, sep = ".")
# paste0("X", 1:5) 与 paste("X", 1:5, sep = "") 等价
str_c("x", 1:3, "z",sep="_")
str_c(c("x", 1:3, "z"), collapse = ", ")
```

## 字符串：提取
```{r}
dna_ex <- "ACAAAGATGCCATTGTCCCCCGGCCTCCTGCTGCTGCT///
GCTCTCCGGGGCCAACGGCCACCGCTGCCCTGCCCCTGGAGGGTGGCCCC///
ACCGGCCGAGACAGCGAGCATATG"

# 字符串长度
length(dna_ex)
str_length(dna_ex)
substr(dna_ex, 10, 20)
str_sub(dna_ex, 10, 20) <- "CCCCCAA" # 替换
```


## 字符串：替换
```{r}
# 替换部分字符串
x <- c("Apple", "Banana", "Pear")
length(x)
nchar(x)
str_sub(x, 1, 1) <- str_to_lower(str_sub(x, 1, 1))
x
str_replace(x, "[aeiou]", "-")
str_replace_all(x, "[aeiou]", "-")
```


## 字符串：切分

```{r}
# 切分字符串
sp_dna <- strsplit(dna_ex, "") 
class(sp_dna)
table(sp_dna)
strsplit(dna_ex, "A")
```

## 字符串:匹配与否
```{r}
x <- c("apple", "banana", "pear")
str_detect(x, "e")
# 进入运算是作为1、0
mean(str_detect(x, "e"))
```

## 字符串：匹配+ 位置规定

```{r}
x <- c("apple", "banana", "pear")
str_view(x, "an")
str_view(x, ".a.") # 前后有东西
str_view(c("abc", "a.c", "bef"), "a\\.c") # 作为文本的点
x <- "a\\b"  # 作为文本的反斜线
str_view(x, "\\\\")
```

## 字符串：匹配+ 位置规定
```{r}
x <- c("apple pie", "apple", "apple cake")
str_view(x, "^a") # 文本头
str_view(x, "apple$") # 文本尾
str_view(x, "^apple$") # 整个匹配
```

## 字符串：匹配+ 类型与数量
* `\d`: matches any digit.
* `\s`: matches any whitespace (e.g. space, tab, newline).
* `[abc]`: matches a, b, or c.
* `[^abc]`: matches anything except a, b, or c.

* `?`: 0 or 1
* `+`: 1 or more
* `*`: 0 or more

* `{n}`: exactly n
* `{n,}`: n or more
* `{,m}`: at most m
* `{n,m}`: between n and m


## 字符串：匹配数量

```{r}
x <- "1888 is the longest year in Roman numerals: MDCCCLXXXVIII"
str_view(x, "CC?")
str_view(x, "CC+")
str_view(x, 'C[LX]+')

str_view(x, "C{2}")
str_view(x, "C{2,}")
str_view(x, "C{2,3}")
```

## 字符串：匹配数量

```{r}
x <- "1888 is the longest year in Roman numerals: MDCCCLXXXVIII"
str_view(x, "C{2,3}") # 贪婪匹配
str_view(x, 'C{2,3}?')  # 最短匹配，在后面放一个问号
str_view(x, 'C[LX]+?')
str_view(c("grey", "gray"), "gr(e|a)y")

```

## 字符串:匹配返回信息（基础包）

```{r}
grep('AA', dna_ex, value = TRUE)  # 原字符串
regexpr('AA', dna_ex) # 首次匹配位置和长度
gregexpr('AA', dna_ex) # 全部匹配位置和长度

```

## 匹配字符串：全部匹配首尾位置
```{r}
str_locate_all(dna_ex, 'AA') # stringr包, str_extract_all提取
```

## 字符串处理：
计算下面的字符集中每一个单词有几个a
```{r}
fruits <- c('Apple', 'Banana', 'Orange', 'Grape', 'Pineapple', 'Kiwi', 'Peach', 'Mango', 'Strawberry', 'Guava', 'Cherry')
fruits
grep('a', fruits, value = TRUE, ignore.case = TRUE) #字符元素
grep('a', fruits, value = FALSE, ignore.case = TRUE) #元素位置
positions_a <- gregexpr(pattern = "a", text = fruits, ignore.case = TRUE) # 每个元素匹配结果
num_a <- sapply(positions_a, function(x) ifelse(x[1] > 0, length(x), 0))
num_a #每个元素中有几个小写a

```

## 括号分组与backreferences

```{r}
fruit[1:9]  #自带fruit数据
str_view(fruit, "(..)\\1", match = TRUE)  # 找出所有重复字符对
```
## 例子: 
```{r}
# stringr::words 数据
# containing at least one vowel（元音）, and negate
no_vowels_1 <- !str_detect(words, "[aeiou]")
# Find all words consisting only of consonants (辅音 non-vowels)
no_vowels_2 <- str_detect(words, "^[^aeiou]+$")
identical(no_vowels_1, no_vowels_2)

```

## 例子：匹配后的子集
```{r}
#等价
words[str_detect(words, "x$")]
str_subset(words, "x$")

# 数据框
wddf <- tibble(
  word = words, 
  i = seq_along(word)
)
wddf %>% 
  filter(str_detect(words, "x$"))
```

## 计算字符数量

```{r}
x <- c("apple", "banana", "pear")
str_count(x, "a")

# 平均多少个元音
mean(str_count(words, "[aeiou]"))

wddf %>% 
  mutate(
    vowels = str_count(word, "[aeiou]"),
    consonants = str_count(word, "[^aeiou]")
  )
```

# 日期与时间变量详解

## 日期函数
```{r}
dates <- c('11/28/2011', '12/07/2012', '08/01/2013', '02/09/2015')
class(dates)
real_dates <- as.Date(dates, format = '%m/%d/%Y')
class(real_dates)

other_format <- format(real_dates, '%A %B %d, %Y')
other_format
class(other_format)

```

## 日期函数{#myImageP90}

日期格式定义
![](../pic/dates.png)
```{r}
format(Sys.Date(),format="%m - %d - %Y")
format(Sys.Date(),format="%m %d %y")
format(Sys.Date(),format="%B %b %Y")
```
##  日期函数
```{r}
(today <- Sys.Date())
dif <- today - real_dates
class(dif)
difftime(today,real_dates,units="week")
as.character(today)

```

##  lubridate包
```{r}
library(lubridate)
today()  # date
now() # date-time (time 可以用hms包)
as_date(now())
as_datetime(today())
```
##  lubridate包
转换为日期-时间
```{r}
ymd("2017-01-31")
mdy("January 31st, 2017")
dmy("31-Jan-2017")
ymd(20170131)
ymd_hms("2017-01-31 20:11:59")
mdy_hm("01/31/2017 08:01")
ymd(20170131, tz = "UTC")
```

## 提取时间成分和组合时间
```{r}
crash_dt <- bike%>%
  mutate(Crash_Month = month(Crash_Date),
         Crash_Day = day(Crash_Date),
         Crash_Min = minute(Crash_Time)) %>% 
  mutate(crash_time =  make_datetime(Crash_Year,
                                     Crash_Month, 
                                     Crash_Day,
                                     Crash_Hour,
                                     Crash_Min))

```

## 例子:2007年10月份内每天的事故数
```{r}
crash_dt %>% 
  filter(crash_time <= ymd(20071030),
         crash_time >= ymd(20071001)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(crash_time))+geom_freqpoly(binwidth = 86400) # 600 s = 10 minutes
```

## 获取成分

<div style="float: left;width: 90%;text-align: left;">
```{r}
datetime <- ymd_hms("2016-07-08 12:34:56")
year(datetime);month(datetime);mday(datetime);yday(datetime);wday(datetime)
month(datetime, label = TRUE)
wday(datetime, label = TRUE, 
     abbr = FALSE)
```
</div>


## 例子：一周七天每天事故数
```{r}
crash_dt %>% 
  mutate(wday = wday(crash_time, label = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = wday)) + geom_bar()
```

## 例子：月内每天事故数
```{r}
crash_dt %>% 
  mutate(month = month(crash_time, label = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = month)) + geom_bar()
```

## 修改时间成分

```{r}
(datetime <- ymd_hms("2016-07-08 12:34:56"))
year(datetime) <- 2020
datetime
month(datetime) <- 01
datetime
hour(datetime) <- hour(datetime) + 1
datetime
ymd("2015-02-01") %>% 
  update(year=2017,hour = 400)
```

## 例子：将日期部分统一以关注日内时间分布

```{r}
crash_dt %>% 
  filter(Crash_Year==2007) %>% 
  mutate(crash_hour = update(crash_time,yday = 1)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(crash_hour)) + geom_freqpoly(binwidth = 300) ## 每5分钟
```

##　日期函数

```{r}
# SPSS格式的时间数据处理
library(foreign)
cred <- read.spss("../xample final/credit_card.sav",to.data.frame =TRUE)
# spss日期转换R格式 
# SPSS的日期以1582年10月14日为基准
cred$dob <- cred$dob++ISOdate(1582,10,14)
cred$card_date <- cred$card_date++ISOdate(1582,10,14)

```
